text: <@U02HCCTFL> I have a question:  the splashthat page for the hackathon of things says we'll be hacking for 20 hours, is it supposed to go all night?
No - there is a pre party where people will choose teams etc. but the venue closes ~9  and opens up at 8am
I agree it's kind of confusing. We're trying to think of a new blurb now
Oh okay gotcha, so the hacking is pretty much all on Saturday. Thanks!
Yup! Friday's Preparty is primarily picking teams, API intros etc. Actual Hackathon runs from 8am -8pm on Saturday
